original_text: But if anyone does not provide for his relatives, and especially for members of his household, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.
korean_text: 누구든지 자기 친족 특히 자기 가족을 돌보지 아니하면 믿음을 배반한 자요 불신자보다 더 악한 자니라

sentences.original_text: But if anyone does not provide for his relatives
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 누군가 자기 친척을 부양하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: and especially for members of his household
and is worse than an unbeliever
